Identify that radio waves travel at the speed of light c = 3.0×10⁸ m/s
Recognize that the time between emission and reception equals the round-trip time for waves to travel to the obstacle and back
Calculate that equal spacing on the display (ab = bc) means the obstacle is at a distance where the round-trip time equals 50μs
Calculate the distance using d = c×t/2, where t is the round-trip time
